item.title: 4 Median of Two Sorted Arrays
item.description: Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2 of size m and n respectively, return the median of the two sorted arrays. Follow up: The overall run time complexity should be O(log (m+n)). Example 1: Input: nums1 = [1,3], nums2 = [2] Output: 2.00000 Explanation: merged array = [1,2,3] and median is 2. Example 2: Input: nums1 = [1,2], nums2 = [3,4] Output: 2.50000 Explanation: merged array = [1,2,3,4] and median is (2 + 3) / 2 = 2.
